page.title: 15POPULAR PETS IN THORNTON CL.
page.content: TODAY THE MOST POPULAR PETS FOR CHILDREN ARE RABBITS AND GUINEA PIGS. SOMETIMES GERBILS,HAMSTERS AND MICE ARE POPULAR FOR A TIME. THERE ARE OTHER PETS THAT ARE A BIT HARDER TO LOOK AFTER INCLUDING CATS AND DOGS.OCCASIONALLY,ODD PEOPLE LIKE SUCH STRANGE PETS AS SNAKES. RABBIT FOOD CONSISTS OF SUNFLOWER SEED,CABBAGE AND CARROTS.GUINEA PIGS EAT MUCH THE SAME.THE BEDDING FOR THEM IS USUALLY STRAW AND THEY NEED TO BE KEPT WARM IN WINTER. IT SEEMS RATHER STRANGE AND SAD TO THINK THAT MY PETS HAVE A BETTER LIFE AND BETTER FOOD THAN PEOPLE IN ETHIOPIA.I HOPE THAT, BY THE TIME YOU READ THIS, EVERYONE WILL HAVE ENOUGH TO EAT AND DRINK. BY {JOANNE APPLEBY,STANAH SCHOOL.}
